name: PROJECT LAZ
description:
This game was made in 2 weeks for "a jam about time." hosted by LoneRabbit. The theme was "Escaping Fate". While it may not be immediately obvious how the game relates to the theme, the more observant of you will be able to piece it together.

PROJECT LAZ relies heavily on environmental storytelling. Try to pay attention to little details and see if you can figure out what's going on.

Playthrough (SPOILERS):

If you're unable to (or don't want to) play through the game yourself. Here is a playthrough that includes how to get all 16 achievements.

Credits:

Everything else: Vykri (me)
